roleset.name: make work on/via computer
roleset.note: COMPUTERIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'computerize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no comparison. (from computerize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: Digital also plans to compete fiercely with IBM when the giant's customers are computerizing new aspects of their businesses.
